physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Multiple emboli in bilateral subsegmental and segmental pulmonary arteries; thrombosis in the left peroneal vein; elevated right-sided filling pressures; hypokinesis of the right ventricle; moderate pulmonary hypertension.
Body mass index of 30.3; otherwise appears healthy.
No lupus anticoagulant, factor V Leiden or prothrombin gene mutations detected; normal functional levels of protein C, protein S, and antithrombin.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: D-dimer level was elevated after discontinuation of warfarin and remained at this level several months later.
